name: Notion Book Tracker
description: Book Tracker & Reading Tracker Notion TemplateThis Book Tracker Notion template is the ultimate reading hub for managing your books, goals and personal notes!Features: Add a new book easily in just one minute Use the List Manager view to add or edit multiple books at the same time. Set your annual reading goal, add books to it, and keep track of your reading list for the year! Browse your bookshelf for ideas for your next read! Also, manage book series! For each book you read, save highlight
features: Add a new book easily in just one minute; Use the List Manager view to add or edit multiple books at the same time.; Set your annual reading goal, add books to it, and keep track of your reading list for the year!; Browse your bookshelf for ideas for your next read!; Also, manage book series!; For each book you read, save highlights (quotes or abstracts) and take personal notes.; Utilize the Books, Tags, Preview, or Favorite filters to search through your highlights with ease.; Access and manage authors and genres through separate views, including statistics.; “Currently Reading” view
